item.title: Laura add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Laura add a quote by Joshilyn Jackson
item.description: "There are gods in Alabama: Jack Daniel's, high school quarterbacks, trucks, big tits, and also Jesus." -- Joshilyn Jackson

item.title: Laura add a quote by Gillian Flynn
item.description: "I have a meanness inside me, real as an organ. Slit me at my belly and it might slide out, meaty and dark, drop on the floor so you could stomp on it." -- Gillian Flynn

item.title: Laura add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "Many a book is like a key to unknown chambers within the castle of one’s own self." -- Franz Kafka

item.title: Laura add a quote by Daphne du Maurier
item.description: "I wish I was a woman of about thirty-six dressed in black satin with a string of pearls." -- Daphne du Maurier

item.title: Laura add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "Words can be like X-rays if you use them properly -- they’ll go through anything. You read and you’re pierced." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Laura add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "I believe in everything until it's disproved. So I believe in fairies, the myths, dragons. It all exists, even if it's in your mind. Who's to say that dreams and nightmares aren't as real as the here and now?" -- John Lennon

item.title: Laura add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us. And the world will live as one." -- John Lennon

item.title: Laura add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Laura add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "As usual, there is a great woman behind every idiot." -- John Lennon

item.title: Laura add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "When I was 5 years old, my mother always told me that happiness was the key to life. When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote down ‘happy’. They told me I didn’t understand the assignment, and I told them they didn’t understand life." -- John Lennon

item.title: Laura add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "The more I see, the less I know for sure." -- John Lennon

item.title: Laura add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "There's nowhere you can be that isn't where you're meant to be..." -- John Lennon

item.title: Laura add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "Living is Easy with Eyes Closed." -- John Lennon

item.title: Laura add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "It's weird not to be weird." -- John Lennon

item.title: Laura add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "Love is like a flower-you've got to let it grow." -- John Lennon

item.title: Laura add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "Words are flowing out like endless rain into a paper cup, They slither wildly as they slip away across the universe Pools of sorrow, waves of joy are drifting through my open mind, Possessing and caressing me. Images of broken light which dance before me like a million eyes, They call me on and on across the universe, Thoughts meander like a restless wind inside a letter box They tumble blindly as they make their way Across the universe Sounds of laughter shades of love are Ringing through my open ears inciting and inviting me Limitless undying love which shines around me like a Million suns, and calls me on and on Across the universe" -- John Lennon

item.title: Laura add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "Whatever gets you through the night" -- John Lennon

item.title: Laura add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death because I don't believe in it. It's just getting out of one car, and into another" -- John Lennon

item.title: Laura add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Laura add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Books are a uniquely portable magic." -- Stephen King

item.title: Laura add a quote by Edith Wharton
item.description: "My little old dog a heart-beat at my feet" -- Edith Wharton

item.title: Laura add a quote by Nancy Farmer
Laura add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Why, darling, I don't live at all when I'm not with you." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Laura add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Road to hell paved in unbought stuffed dogs. Not my fault." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Laura add a quote by David Henry Hwang
item.description: "I'm happy. Which often looks like crazy." -- David Henry Hwang

item.title: Laura add a quote by Mary Roach
item.description: "The way I see it, being dead is not terribly far off from being on a cruise ship. Most of your time is spent lying on your back. The brain has shut down. The flesh begins to soften. Nothing much new happens, and nothing is expected of you. " -- Mary Roach

item.title: Laura add a quote by Eugene Field
item.description: "No book can be appreciated until it has been slept with and dreamed over." -- Eugene Field

item.title: Laura add a quote by Jane Smiley
item.description: "Many people, myself among them, feel better at the mere sight of a book." -- Jane Smiley

item.title: Laura add a quote by Thomas Keneally
item.description: "Whoever saves one life, saves the world entire." -- Thomas Keneally
